title: Fallon explains why Brett Kavanaugh 'barely touched his beer' in Best of Late Night
text:
It seems that the oldest candidates in the Democratic race for president aren't shying away from age-related questions, they're embracing them. Meanwhile, other candidates are running toward the latest Brett Kavanaugh controversy.

Sens. Bernie Sanders, 78, and Elizabeth Warren, 70, along with former Vice President Joe Biden, 76, recently announced that they would release their medical records. After Biden was accused of being forgetful during the last presidential debate, a release of medical records from the three oldest candidates in the race could put to rest any questions about their fitness for office.

But comic Jimmy Kimmel pokes a hole in the veneer. Show me one 70-year-old, Kimmel says, who doesn't want to talk about their medical problems.

Sen. Kamala Harris isn't jumping on the health wagon. Instead, she's calling for Supreme Court justice Kavanaugh's impeachment. Why? Fallon explains in today's Best of Late Night, above.

Jimmy Fallon More

After you watch our favorite jokes from last night's late-night lineup, vote for yours in the poll below.

Follow Eileen Rivers on Twitter @msdc14.

This article originally appeared on USA TODAY: Fallon explains why Brett Kavanaugh 'barely touched his beer'
description: The comics talk Democratic candidates and a Supreme Court justice.
